title: Testing
body: Just trying to get my name synced up correctly, Ignore me Poros.

replies.body: Hey!  The pinned [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)should help do that without requiring a post! :D
It didnt last night, but we're all sorted now ^_^
